conbody.p: Goal: This guide is created for practicing the theory covered in the Udemy course How to Write Using DITA XML , and only for an educational purpose.

Content: The guide's content is based on my knowledge gained from playing the Path of Exile online game, and I used as a reference to ensure the correctness of some items' names or facts mentioned in the guide.

Audience: The guide provides versions for experienced and novice players.
Experienced players are considered those, familiar with the Path of Exile game concepts and terminology, who only need guidelines for a specific crafting features.
Novice players are just entering the world of Path of Exile. They need additional information about the general aspects related to the items, and item crafting.

Both groups are considered to have an experience with the game itself, knowledge of the gameplay and of how the interface and the different items look like, what their names are, and how to interact with them.
